fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mark someone for immediate public execution. The target you vote will be the one to be hanged, not the one who received voting majority. Infinite uses, but you die if you execute a Townie, as you will be overthrown for incompetence.
- At night, you may declare martial law, which lasts for the rest of the game. You gain a Basic Attack, Basic defense, and deal an Unstoppable attack to your attacker the first time you are attacked. However, all public executions will be canceled, meaning nobody (including you) can vote during the day once martial law has been declared.
- At night, send an agent to dispose of a target, dealing an Astral Basic attack. Only works once martial law has been declared. Infinite uses, but this ability is locked if you kill a Townie.

fields.name: Attribute:
fields.value:
- With your first ability, your vote is still public, but the reason why your target was hanged instead is not revealed.
- All players receive an announcement when martial law has been declared.
- Your Unstoppable attack retaliation can only trigger on a single attack, but that attacker's attack will fail.
